mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT dicc.`name` as complaint_type_name, sw.create_date, org.org_name as liable_department_name, dic.`name` as question_type1_name, dict.`name` as question_type2_name, dics.`name` as source_name, sw.order_status, swr.operation_date, sw.reception_time, sw.treament_time, (SELECT count(id) FROM sale_workorder WHERE order_no = #{orderno}) as workCount, (SELECT count(id) FROM sale_workorder WHERE order_no= #{orderno} AND order_status in ('COMPLETED', 'SATISFIED', 'COMMONLY', 'UNSATISFIED', 'INVALIDVISIT', 'FAILUREVISIT', 'NVISIT', 'CONSULTOVER', 'UNEXECUTED')) AS completCount FROM sale_workorder sw LEFT JOIN sale_workorder_rmk swr ON sw.id = swr.work_order_id AND swr.operation_type='FINISHORDER' LEFT JOIN sale_dictionary dic on dic.id=sw.question_type1 LEFT JOIN sale_dictionary dict on dict.id=sw.question_type2 LEFT JOIN sale_dictionary dics ON sw.source = dics.id LEFT JOIN sale_dictionary dicc ON sw.complaint_type = dicc.id LEFT JOIN sale_organization org ON sw.liable_department = org.id WHERE sw.order_no= #{orderno}
